description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Haroon Sheikh - Philosopher without Borders

ABSTRACT
As technology is becoming ubiquitous in our daily lives, it is impacting the way we relate to the world and ourselves. What does it mean for our identities when our houses, cars, cities and bodies are becoming "smart"? From the Singularity to Cyborgs [...]

Read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Philosophical%20Reflections%20on%20Technology

title: GOTO 2016 • Philosophical Reflections on Technology • Haroon Sheikh
